member.name: T:Triangulation_Visualization.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.frmLoadPopPolys.obtainTransformationFile
member.summary: obtains the file but does not create the transformation

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.frmLoadPopPolys.makeTransformation
member.summary: Loads transformation from existing file or creates a new one depending on what options is selected

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.ITransformation.HandleMouseDown(DotSpatial.Controls.Map,System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Handles the mouse down on the map that the user uses to draw the transformation. The input location is in map units.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cRectangleTransformation.stretchRec(System.Int32,System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Stretches rectangle away from previously defined baseline. Source rectangle must already exist.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cRectangleTransformation.invertSrcRec
member.summary: Reverses the source rectangle coordinate sequence if it is counterclockwise, otherwise leaves it alone. Source rectangle must already exist.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cRectangleTransformation.createTargetRec
member.summary: Creates target rectangle as exact replica of source rectangle. Source rectangle must already exist, and should already be inverted if necessary.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cRectangleTransformation.updateBoundaryRec
member.summary: Creates boundary rec by buffering the enclosure around the source and target rectangles by the default percentage. Source and boundary must already be created.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cRectangleTransformation.moveTargetRec(System.Drawing.PointF,System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Moves the target rectangle by the vector between fromP and toP. Boundary rectangle should typically be updated afterwards. Target and boundary rectangles must already be created.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cRectangleTransformation.stretchTargetCorner(System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Stretches the corner recorded as being selected on the target rectangle to the given input location.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cRectangleTransformation.fillInDCELtable(DotSpatial.Data.FeatureSet@)
member.summary: Fills in the LPoly, RPoly, FromNode, ToNode, NextForward and NextBackward fields of the input. Input should be a line shapefile with exactly 28 rows and 6 columns.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cRectangleTransformation.getTIN_nodes(System.Int32)
member.summary: Produces coordinates for the transformation TINs. Input parameter controls whether coordinates are for source TIN (0) or target TIN (1).

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cRectangleTransformation.getTIN_edgeFS(System.Int32)
member.summary: Produces geometry features for the transformation TINs. Does not create DCEL table. Input parameter controls whether coordinates are for source TIN (0) or target TIN (1).

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cRectangleTransformation.createPointIndex
member.summary: Creates point index from the points in the target and boundary rectangles.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cRectangleTransformation.errBase
member.summary: Base text for error messages thrown in this class.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cLineTransformation.createTargetLine
member.summary: Creates target line feature (i.e. DL(1)) as copy of source line feature (i.e. DL(0))

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cLineTransformation.placeFirstPoint(System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Creates first point of source line.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cLineTransformation.moveEndPoint(System.Int32,System.Drawing.PointF,System.Boolean)
member.summary: If geometry is valid, moves the given endpoint of the targetLine to the new location. DrawList should have 4 items, with last item being temporary mouse indicator.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cLineTransformation.moveTargetLine(System.Drawing.PointF,System.Boolean)
member.summary: If geometry is valid, moves the target line along the vector from the original mouse down location to the input location.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cLineTransformation.moveBoundary(System.Drawing.PointF,System.Boolean)
member.summary: If geometry is valid, moves the given edge of the target line by adjusting the buffer proportion and recreating the object.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cLineTransformation.getTIN_nodes(System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs point features from drawing objects. Three drawing objects must be present.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cLineTransformation.getTIN_edgeFS(System.Int32)
member.summary: Produces geometry features for the transformation TINs. Does not create DCEL table. Input parameter controls whether coordinates are for source TIN (0) or target TIN (1).

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.cLineTransformation.fillInDCELtable(DotSpatial.Data.FeatureSet@)
member.summary: Fills in the LPoly, RPoly, FromNode, ToNode, NextForward and NextBackward fields of the input. Input should be a line shapefile with exactly 15 rows and 6 columns.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.frmTriangleCartograms.matchingExtent(DotSpatial.Data.Extent,DotSpatial.Controls.Map)
member.summary: Calculates the extent on the other map that approximately matches the input extent on the input map.

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.frmTriangleCartograms.zoomOtherMapToMatch(DotSpatial.Controls.Map)
member.summary: Zooms the other map to match the extent of the current (input) map

member.name: M:Triangulation_Visualization.frmTriangleCartograms.applyCustomTransformation
member.summary: Applies a custom transformation to the source grid by back-transforming the given transformation on the target grid. Does not update the map layers or the map itself.
